objects.text: • PREMIUM FLYKNIT • ICONIC DESIGN • WOLF GREY & GOLD

product_details.name: Nike Air Jordan 1 High Flyknit - Wolf Grey/Golden Harvest
product_details.description:
• Premium Flyknit construction for lightweight comfort and breathability
• Iconic high-top silhouette with classic Air Jordan design
• Elegant wolf grey colorway with golden harvest swoosh accents
• Durable gum rubber outsole for superior traction
• Breathable mesh upper with strategic support zones
• Classic wing logo branding on collar
• Cushioned ankle collar for enhanced comfort
• Traditional lacing system for secure fit
• Versatile style suitable for both athletic and casual wear
• Limited edition colorway perfect for collectors

banner_details:
This banner presents a bold and stylish promotional design focused on a premium footwear product. At the top, a prominent heading (`heading`) in uppercase block letters establishes brand presence, with a subheading (`subheading`) directly below, using a vibrant gold color to highlight a specific product edition. The main product (`product_image`) is centrally spotlighted within a clean white circular frame bordered by gold, drawing attention with minimal distraction.

A gradient-highlighted circular badge to the right contains the clearly visible price (`price`), enhancing emphasis. Supporting product features are concisely presented in a bold tagline (`tagline`) along the bottom. A highlighted call-to-action button (`cta_button`) and accompanying text (`cta`) invites user engagement. Subtle background gradients, soft geometric overlays, and playful gold accents add texture and polish to the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #F5F5F5 to #D3D3D3  
- Accent Gold: #D4AF37  
- Orange-Gold Gradient: #F5A623 to #D4AF37  
- Text Dark Shade: #333333  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of mid-top sneakers with a stylish blend of soft gray and mustard yellow. The primary color is a cool, light gray (#C3C6C8), used across the knit upper, laces, and tongue, providing a clean and neutral base. Accents of mustard yellow (#D39E29) are strategically placed on the Nike swoosh, branding patch, and outsole trim, creating a vibrant contrast that draws immediate attention. The sole is white (#F6F6F5), maintaining balance and enhancing the minimalistic aesthetic. These tones are blended harmoniously, with yellow highlights providing visual pop against the gray backdrop, making it ideal for a dynamic, modern banner design.
